mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.name, m.gender, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, m.profile_photo, s.sch_name, t.tch_no, t.appr_stat, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type from member m left outer join teacher t on m.mem_no = t.tch_no left outer join teacher_photo tp on t.tch_no = tp.tch_no left outer join school s on t.tch_no = s.tch_no left outer join lesson_subject ls on t.tch_no = ls.tch_no left outer join subject sub on ls.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where t.appr_stat = 1 and m.mem_type_no = #{memberTypeNo}

select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.name, m.gender, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, m.profile_photo, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type from member m left outer join student stu on m.mem_no= stu.std_no left outer join wanted_lesson wl on stu.std_no = wl.std_no left outer join subject sub on wl.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where m.mem_type_no = #{memberTypeNo}

select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.reg_date, m.gender, m.dob, m.name, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, m.profile_photo, m.curr_lesson_dt, m.curr_lesson_st, m.curr_lesson_et, tp.tch_photo, t.tch_intro, t.vid_addr, ls.wanted_fee, s.sch_name, s.major, st.sch_type, sub.sub_name, l.tch_review, l.tch_eval,l.lesson_no from member m left outer join teacher t on m.mem_no = t.tch_no left outer join teacher_photo tp on t.tch_no = tp.tch_no left outer join school s on t.tch_no = s.tch_no left outer join lesson_subject ls on t.tch_no = ls.tch_no left outer join subject sub on ls.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no left outer join lesson l on t.tch_no = l.tch_no where m.mem_no= #{mem_no}

select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.reg_date, m.gender, m.dob, m.name, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, m.profile_photo, m.curr_lesson_dt, m.curr_lesson_st, m.curr_lesson_et, mt.mem_type_name, stu.req_to_teacher, st.sch_type, sub.sub_name, l.std_review, wl.wanted_fee from member m left outer join member_type mt on m.mem_type_no = mt.mem_type_no left outer join student stu on m.mem_no = stu.std_no left outer join lesson l on stu.std_no = l.std_no left outer join wanted_lesson wl on stu.std_no = wl.std_no left outer join subject sub on wl.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where m.mem_no= #{mem_no}

select m.mem_no, m.name, m.profile_photo, t.appr_stat, m.gender, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type, ls.wanted_fee from member m left outer join teacher t on m.mem_no = t.tch_no left outer join lesson_subject ls on t.tch_no = ls.tch_no left outer join subject sub on ls.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where t.appr_stat = 1 and addr_city LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mySido}, '%')
addr_sub LIKE CONCAT('%', #{myGugun}, '%')
